channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘Perception vs. reality’: Trump’s economy picks up speed — but voters aren’t buying it yet
item.description: Economist Stephen Moore says economic momentum is building under President Donald Trump, but lingering voter pessimism and cost-of-living concerns are...

item.title: The ‘occupations most exposed to AI automation’ actually outperform the rest of the job market, new research reveals
item.description: A new Vanguard study reveals that the 100 professions rubbing shoulders with AI the most are thriving, but admits there will be some “distinct labor m...

item.title: Trump’s tariffs actually slashed the deficit from a record $136.4 billion to less than half that. Here’s what else they did
item.description: The double-digit taxes on imports from almost every country have disrupted global commerce and strained the budgets of consumers and businesses worldw...

item.title: Tiny Pacific nation to take up to 75 deportees as Trump administration accelerates mass removals
item.description: Palau, a small Pacific nation with 18,000 residents, agreed to accept U.S. deportees to address labor shortages. The deal includes millions in aid.

item.title: Trump Targets the Islamic State in Nigeria
item.description: The U.S. launched Tomahawk cruise missiles at two Islamic State bases, and the administration is claiming the deaths of multiple terrorists.

item.title: Kash Patel announces permanent closure of J. Edgar Hoover FBI Building for Reagan building move
item.description: FBI Director Kash Patel announces closure of Hoover building, saving billions by relocating headquarters operations to the existing Reagan building.

item.title: Anduril founder Palmer Luckey is among the U.S. defense execs and companies sanctioned by China over arms sales to Taiwan
item.description: The sanctions entail freezing the companies’ assets in China and banning individuals and organizations from dealing with them, according to the Chines...

item.title: White House press secretary Karoline Leavitt is pregnant with a baby girl
item.description: White House press secretary Karoline Leavitt is having a baby.

item.title: The Best Classic Movies And T.V. To Watch With Your Family This Post-Christmas Week
item.description: Here is your ultimate guide to the best old-school films and T.V. series to enjoy in the days between Christmas and New Year's.

item.title: Marty Supreme’s American Hustler
item.description: Chalamet and Safdie salute the me-first nation.

item.title: White House to share ballroom plans with commission in January
item.description: The White House will present its ballroom plans to the National Capital Planning Commission at a meeting next month.

item.title: Misspelled learning center, no children inside: Emmer presses Walz over Minnesota daycare tied to $4M
item.description: A YouTuber confronted a Minnesota daycare that can't spell "learning" but reportedly got $4 million in taxpayer funds amid a growing fraud scandal.

item.title: Dominion Energy Virginia sues over Trump order to halt offshore wind project, calling it ‘arbitrary and capricious’
item.description: Dominion called this week's order “the latest in a series of irrational agency actions attacking offshore wind and then doubling down when those actio...

item.title: Trump suggests he'll call final shots on peace deal ahead of Zelenskyy meeting: 'We'll see what he's got'
item.description: President Donald Trump said he will call the final shots on any Ukraine-Russia peace deal ahead of a reported meeting with Ukrainian President Volodym...

item.title: Silver prices continue soaring as debt fears and geopolitical tensions send precious metals to fresh record highs
item.description: So far this year, silver has spiked 169%, platinum has shot up 172%, and palladium has soared 124%.

item.title: Heritage Foundation restocks after wave of scholars defect to Pence-led group
item.description: The Heritage Foundation wasted no time filling some of the vacancies left by its departing scholars and staffers, taking an upbeat tone despite the re...

item.title: California auditor finds millions in wasted dollars in state agencies
item.description: The California State Auditor's office found that several agencies wasted, misused or failed to report over $5 million in funds.

item.title: New York Legalizes Doctors Prescribing Death
item.description: New York Gov. Hochul announced last week that she will sign a bill legalizing medically assisted suicide for adults with a terminal illness.

item.title: Ladies, You’re Loading The Dishwasher All Wrong. Here’s How To Do It The Right Way
item.description: The Federalist is here with a step-by-step guide on how to properly load a dishwasher and end your kitchen nightmares once and for all.

item.title: Father Christmas and the War for Middle-earth
item.description: For Christmas 1941, J.R.R. Tolkien and C.S. Lewis sought to find the light amid a dark season.

item.title: Netflix Clings to DEI
item.description: Young white men today know not only that the world is unfair but that it is unfair for the benefit of others by design.

item.title: I Love Stupid Christmas Chick Flicks
item.description: I don’t mind when every conflict is solved by hot cocoa and premarital eye contact.

item.title: Artificial Intelligence In The Classroom Destroys Actual Intelligence In Students
item.description: Students should aspire to be more than mere 'prompt writers,' but minds capable of thinking, reasoning, and perseverance.
